page.title: 19HELMSHORE VILLAGE.
page.content:
{Causway Head}is three hundred years old and is built from solid stone. The people who own the house think that it is a cottage, but nobody really knows. The building is under conservation, so it cannot be altered. The roof is covered with flag stones. The walls are made of solid stone and are 50 centimetres thick. The cottage was originally a farm.
Nearby{Rose Cottage}is very attractive. There is a field next to the cottage and cows from an adjoining farm graze there.
Roads joining the cottages are simply dirt tracks. Little has changed this part of Helmshore Village over the years.
